summary: Fall in to the Sky - Chapter 2 - WhumptyDumpty - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
body:
Fall in to the Sky - Chapter 2 - WhumptyDumpty - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]

Another chapter! I’m so proud of it so far, but I’m open to criticism. This is my first fic, and I’m way behind most of y'all- I’ll be 18 in two weeks and have never successfully written a fanfiction. I hope this will change that!

summary: Peter: *Sliding into the kitchen with socks on and a pair of Tony’s sunglasses* ALL YOU GOTTA DO IS JUST BELIEVE YOU CAN BE WHO...
body:
Peter: *Sliding into the kitchen with socks on and a pair of Tony’s sunglasses* ALL YOU GOTTA DO IS JUST BELIEVE YOU CAN BE WHO YOU WANNA BE

Stephen: *Almost falls off the stool*

Peter: SINCERELY, MEEEEEEE

Stephen: He’s singing that song again

Tony: *Takes out one earplug* What?

blog.name: lotsoffandomimagines
blog.title: ✎ Just Imagine It ✎
blog.description:
☆ masterlist → rules → fandom list → about → fav imagines ☆
Hi! The name’s Ace. My blog runs on requests so send them in, but read my rules and fandom list before doing so! Gifs aren't mine. OC information is in my “about” link. Last but not least, this is a safe space for everyone! Be nice to each other and let your imagination soar.

summary:
Requested by anonymous 
When you arrived at Stark industries for your internship you honestly expected nothing eventful to...
body:
Requested by anonymous

When you arrived at Stark industries for your internship you honestly expected nothing eventful to happen. You imagined your day including you working in the lab and what not. However when you walked up to your work desk, you were surprised to find that your research notes weren’t the only things that you’d find there. In fact there was a box of chocolates sitting on your desk.

You picked the sweets up and stared at them for a moment. Then it occurred to you. You were so focused on getting here on time that you forgot what day it was. It was Valentine’s Day and a box of chocolates on Valentine’s Day couldn’t be anything less than a gift. However you highly doubted that anyone would be giving you a gift on this particular holiday so your next thought was that this simply had to be a mistake.

Your opinion quickly shifted when none other than your boss entered the room. “Oh so you found the chocolates huh?” Tony said, as he walked toward you. “It took a bit of asking around but someone told me that those were your favourites”.

“Sorry, are these from you sir?” You asked in disbelief.

“Of course… don’t get the wrong idea or anything. It’s not suppose to be creepy. I just see you like a daughter is all and you’ve been doing such great work during your internship that I thought the least I could do was get you a gift” Tony explained. A slow smile soon appeared on your face.

“Wow, thanks Mr Stark. That’s really nice of you”.

REQUESTS ARE OPEN

summary: Superhero could be used abstractly, with the size of the universe some other life had to exist, but I didn’t expect to live past...
body: Superhero could be used abstractly, with the size of the universe some other life had to exist, but I didn’t expect to live past thirty let alone get married, so that has to take it. Add in that it’s Pepper, and I’d call you nuts.

reblog.comment: Superhero could be used abstractly, with the size of the universe some other life had to exist, but I didn’t expect to live past thirty let alone get married, so that has to take it. Add in that it’s Pepper, and I’d call you nuts.

title: the american dream
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2I8JeOp

by avienexjel

in the end, they never officially break it off. they just start visiting each other less and less, and less, and then it’s like they were never together in the first place.

or - tony and steve are in love before ultron. they might say they are in love after, but then come the issues.

body:
Superior Iron Man x Peter

∆ So Iron Man turns bad and sends out the Iron league to watch over everyone

∆ Tony Stark becomes the Mayor, Ruler, and Judge for New York all in one day

∆ A very controlling leader and is hungry for more power

∆ Then Peter Parker gets bitten by a radioactive spider

∆ Now Peter has looked up to Tony Stark all his life and immediately goes to him for help, because Tony can fix it right?

∆ Tony sees Peter as a threat and locks him up

∆ However once Hydra sends an attack at Stark base everything changes

∆ So now Tony takes the poor kid under his wing and trains him

∆ Peter is overjoyed, despite the fact that he spent months in a cold jail cell with hardly any food to survive on

∆ Tony starts to realise just how pretty his protege is

∆ After a celebration at ending Hydra’s Captain America, the two kiss

∆ Both drunk and high on lust the two stumble to bed

∆ Peter now wear a collar, ‘Tony’s Trophy’

∆ Tony lavishes Peter with gifts and such

∆ Once Aunt May finds out where Peter is she goes ballistic

∆ Unfortunately for her, Peter is already too fall into the Iron Man’s trap to realize that Tony had locked May up

∆ Fortunately for everyone, Tony is more of a kind leader thanks to Peter

∆ And pray for anyone who tries to harm the Superior leader’s trophy

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: cut from his strings
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2DAc7NX

by macabre

Peter has to look away. He at first looks down at his hands, and he sees that the medical bracelet that they put on him is looped around twice. The hospital gown was swimming on him when he stood up, but that’s what they’re made to do. He’s not starved. He’s fine. He’s a good size.

Words: 3088, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Spider-Man - All Media Types, Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Iron Man (Movies)

summary:
Peter P: *sings along to Hey look ma, I made it*
Spidey: * is silent during the "Ma"'s* 
Tony: kiddo... *Sings "hey look son, I...
body:
Peter P: *sings along to Hey look ma, I made it*

Spidey: * is silent during the “Ma”’s*

Tony: kiddo… *Sings “hey look son, I made it”*

Spidey: !!!! *Sings “hey look Pa, I made it”*

Aunt May: hey! What about “hey look May, I made it?

summary: Outside of you There is No Place to Go
title: Outside of you There is No Place to Go
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2BwOndC

by catemonsterq

Darcy and Tony on out on a date when a call to assemble comes through - the fight is only a few blocks away so Tony tucks Darcy where she’ll be safe from it and goes off for battle. When Darcy gets injured will anyone notice?

Or, Clint finds out.

summary: Tony stans are the best and most loyal, supportive and horny I swear. In Marvel might be lot of Tony hate but on the other hand...
body: Tony stans are the best and most loyal, supportive and horny I swear. In Marvel might be lot of Tony hate but on the other hand there’s also the most faithful and powerful Tony army which is defending him and adoring every curve, word and action of him. Every time somebody offends our baby we’re ready to step in and fight tooth and nail…And every time when he appears we’re all like oh he’s is so hot, even when he’s literally dying..I guess when they would let us defend Tony against Thanos that purple grape would never win because even the stones wouldn’t be able to stop us!Thank you all❤️
